channel.title: Server is Online, but cannot connect o.O [HELP?]
channel.description:
Hey! I read a guide for Server Setup. I did everything:
*Portforward: Portforward.com's Port Checker says its OPEN. *No-IP: 100% *Source Downloaded: TestScape *Latest JDK..
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/2my9ftw.jpg[/img]
Well, I set it up, and then I post my server to Server Status Pages. Yeah, its online!.. Well not really! ¨ I try to login, it keeps connecting.. and I check my Server (CMD Window) and it says that connection from my IP is accepted..But connection fails! I added port to Firewall, and accepted connection, still no. I set Firewall OFF, Still no.
But yes, I can see peoples IP who are trying to connect, and Server is "Online" on Server Status Pages. What is wrong with it?

item.title: Server is Online, but cannot connect o.O [HELP?]
item.dc:creator: @badness badness
item.description:
@badness wrote:

Lawl, its not working at all
I just checked my Client, and its “LOCALHOST ONLY” Client…

So, its not working for me.
Btw James, Windows Firewall is OFF, I dont use it ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 10, 2009, 04:35:51 am[/size][hr]Added Image to First post!

Read full topic

I changed source, but it doesnt work either. I tried several clients.
